snippet.title: Reveal Teaser| My Time at Evershine
snippet.description:
Kickstarter coming on Sep. 24. Subscribe to the pre-launch page here:
https://kck.st/3ZqobNs

My Time at Evershine is a high-quality sandbox simulation RPG and the sequel to My Time at Sandrock and My Time at Portia. Embark on a grand cozy adventure with many memorable characters in the 3rd My Time game!

Learn more about the game on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3199500
